code: /*----- Importaciones y dependencias -----*/import{createContext}from'react';import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const AppContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();/*----- Context Provider -----*/export const AppContextProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[auth,setAuth]=useState(null);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const[logged,setLogged]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppContext.Provider,{value:{auth,isLoading,logged,setAuth,setIsLoading,setLogged},children:children});};
